name: Telecube Nightmare
description: A platformer with no jump or walking. The levels promise to confuse you by venturing behind your puzzles. The challenge is done! [ยบ_ยบ] Lead the fun pink block to the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: 1.8 Ghz+ Dual Core or greater i5 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
